title: Ep. 793 - Using Government For Good
description:
The FDA prepares to add a new vaccine health warning for young people, House Republicans move to break up Big Tech, and Ron DeSantis wants to force schools to teach students about the evils of communism.
My new book ’Speechless: Controlling Words, Controlling Minds,’ is now available wherever books are sold. Grab your copy today here: https://utm.io/udtMJ 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
